title: How do you deal with caitlyn?
body: Okay so I'm a plat / diamond jungler, and I literally have no idea how you deal with that champion. She has literally everything and seemingly no weaknesses. Escape? Check, Zone control? CHECK, huge range, great synergy with hurricane, outrageous damage due to her passive, extremely big burst with headshot E headshot, stupidly hard to push against because of trap set up, stupidly hard to engage when shes at your turret, due to turret line and massive range.   I don't really have a problem with any other adc but caitlyn feels impossible to play against if the player is good, or if they have a team peeling.
